text: Nejc Barič (born April 23, 1997 in Ljubljana, Slovenia) is a Slovenian professional basketball player for Krka of the Slovenian Basketball League. He is a 1.83 m tall point guard. ==Professional career== Barič started playing professional basketball for Zlatorog Laško. In July 2019, Barič signed with Koper Primorska.Nejc Baric pens deal with Sixt Primorska. In July 2020, he signed for Krka. ==Personal life== His older sister Nika is also a professional basketball player. ==References== ==External links== * Eurobasket.com profile * REALGM profile Category:1997 births Category:Living people Category:Slovenian men's basketball players Category:Point guards
title: Nejc Barič
